--- In junit@y..., Rick Denman <denman@s...> wrote:
> 
> I am teaching a course in extreme programming in the spring, and I 
would
> like to know if there is a university friendly (i.e. free) source 
code
> management tool that works well with JUnit and the IDE Kawa. I plan 
to have
> several pairs of programmers working on the same project, and of 
course
> want to require frequent code integration. 
> 
> Thanks,
> 
> Rick Denman
> Southwestern University
